text: Fernhurst is an electoral ward of Chichester District, West Sussex, England and returns one member to sit on Chichester District Council. Following a district boundary review, Fittleworth was created from the Bury and Petworth wards in 2019. ==Councillors== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Year!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | |2019 |Alan Sutton ||Conservative |} ==Election results== :* Elected ==References== ==External links== * Chichester District Council * Election Maps Category:Wards of Chichester District
title: Fittleworth (ward)
